alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 21 at 2:58PM MST until February 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will continue this evening, with some brief reduced visibilities. Accumulations will be an inch or less.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
